result.execSummary:
All charges against Alexis L Wright in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Alexis L Wright is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Alexis L Wright

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Alexis L Wright in court.  Attorney Michael V Fuentes in court for Alexis L Wright.  
Prosecuting attorney Katrina Voge in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm. 
Case set for jury trial.  State's essential witness failed to appear.  State has no alternative theory of prosecution.  Defense motion to DISMISS is granted by the Court WITHOUT PREJUDICE.
Pretrial Services Supervision Report 10-10-2022. filed.  rmm

Defendant Alexis L Wright in court with attorney Michael V Fuentes.  
Annie Louk appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.  
Status conference held.  Atty. Fuentes requests a final pretrial and trial date.  Court orders any pretrial documents be filed no later than 48 hours before the final pretrial date. Court informed the parties that good faith negotiation are to be held before the final pretrial and parties should be prepared to inform the Court if the case is going to proceed to trial or if it is going to resolve. Case is adjourned to Br. 1.  Final pre-trial scheduled for October 10, 2022 at 10:00 am.  Jury trial scheduled for October 24, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Pretrial Services Supervision Report - 06-17-2022, filed.  rmm

Defendant Alexis L Wright in court with attorney Michael V Fuentes.  
Abby Rockendorf appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.
OFF THE RECORD.  Pretrial conference held.  Atty. Fuentes has received discovery and an offer and requests a status date.  Case is adjourned to Br. 1.  Status conference scheduled for June 17, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Pretrial Services Supervision Report 5-18-2022, filed.  rmm

Court ordered no contact with JWG
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.
  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Alexis L Wright in court with attorney Dawn Marie Rablin.  Defendant Alexis L Wright in custody.  Anna Marie Meulbroek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   All parties appeared by video conference.
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Davila, Branch 1. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.
  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 18, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
